description:
Ryo sees the news about Queen Rika`s divorce and recalls the past when she approached him for help to steal Meraldo Kingdom`s treasure, a necklace.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Memories of the Necklace Incident? Ryo, A Bad Girl & Makimura
Tsuioku no Kubikazari Jiken! Ryou to Akujo to Makimura to
追憶の首飾り事件! リョウと悪女と槙村と
